Text: downloaded and it's in an MKV format - don't know how to open so I assume it's fake
thats funny - somebody isnt able to open and so it has to be a fake!.... strange logic in particular because sN1b wrote down the necessary codec in the info... strange people here sometimes...
This is real and coded with the best codecs available! h264 and AAC have much better compression than xvid and MP3, so smaller file sizes.

this actually looks real good for the file size and high resolution (aka low bits/pixel) but way better then i expected. the video is as good if not a little better then the 350mb rip
does anyone know what the audio bitrate is?
It should be more or less 32kbits. But audio isn't encoded using bitrate. Aside from mp3, which would  probably kill your ears at 32kbits.
